content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It sounds like you have a solid plan in place to maximize your points or miles earnings with your current travel habits.

Remember to always review your credit card accounts and adjust your strategy as needed. If you find that you're not earning enough points or miles in a particular category, consider switching to a different card or adjusting your spending habits.

Also, don't forget to take advantage of sign-up bonuses and limited-time offers to earn extra points or miles. And, as I mentioned earlier, consider using a credit card aggregator tool or app to track your rewards earnings and optimize your strategy.

By following these tips and maximizing your points or miles earnings, you'll be able to redeem for rewards more quickly and enjoy more benefits on your travels.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy travels and happy earning!
